figure_1.title: Figure 1:
figure_1.caption: Estimated nonparametric risk functions of age at ART initiation, derived from fitting the PLGOR model to the HIV data. The solid and dashed lines represent the loss to care and death in care, respectively.

claims.sentence: For proper interpretation, we plot the two fitted nonparametric risk functions in Figure 1.
